name: Fruit Painter
description:
In Fruit Painter the developer have forgotten to paint the fruit with it's right color. 

Its up to you to paint the fruit. Available color so far is green, red and yellow.

The fruit drops from the sky and with you painter it should not be a problem. 

Press Q to switch beetween colors. Green fruit need green color and red fruit need red color.

Apple, pear = green color

Apple, cherry and watermelon = red color

Banana, pineapple and orange = yellow color

A/D = Run

Space = Jump

Left mouse = Fire paint

Q = Switch colors
